name: absorption
description: Indicates a chiller which uses absorption driven by hot water (as opposed to vapor compression).

name: ac
description: Indicates an alternating current (AC) electrical quantity or device.

name: active
description: Applied to an electrical power point to indicate active power or real power typically measured in "kW".

name: ahu
description: Air Handler Unit which heats and/or cools air.

name: ahuRef
description: Associate an entity such as a vav with an ahu. References equip id

name: air
description: Point associated with the measurement or control of air.

name: airCooled
description: Indicates chiller which uses air to cool the hot refrigerant.

name: angle
description: Indicates an angle measurement.

name: apparent
description: Applied to an electrical power point to indicate apparent power typically measured in "kVA".

name: area
description: Floor area of a site measured in ft² or m².

name: avg
description: Indicates an average quantity.

name: barometric
description: Defines the mean atmospheric pressure at sea level measured in millibar or inHg.

name: blowdown
description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of the blowdown water expelled from a coolingTower or boiler to remove mineral build up.

name: boiler
description: Boiler equip used to generate hot water or steam for heating.

name: bypass
description: If used with valve indicates a by-pass in a piping system.

name: centrifugal
description: Indicates chiller compressor which uses a continuous flow of fluid through an impeller.

name: chilled
description: Marker tag used with water for the chilled water system between the plant and ahu.

name: chilledBeamZone
description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air to zones via chilled beam terminal units.

name: chilledWaterCool
description: Indicates that a unit has cooling capability using chilled water.

name: chilledWaterPlant
description: Models the entire plant and its system of equipment used to generate chilled water.

name: chilledWaterPlantRef
description: Associate a record such as an ahu with its chilledWaterPlant. References equip id

name: chiller
description: Chillers remove heat from a liquid via a vapor compression or an absorption refrigeration cycle.

name: circ
description: Indicates a pump designed to circulate a fluid through an equipment such as a boiler.

name: circuit
description: An equip which models an electric circuit housed in an elecPanel.

name: closedLoop
description: Indicates coolingTower which keeps the working fluid separate from the fluid used for heat transfer into the atmosphere.

name: cloudage
description: The fraction of the sky obscured by clouds.

name: cmd
description: Classifies a point as an output AO/BO command or actuator.

name: co
description: Carbon monoxide level point measured in "ppm".

name: co2
description: Carbon dioxide level point measured in "ppm".

name: coldDeck
description: Associated with the cold air ductwork in a dualDuct or tripleDuct AHU.

name: condensate
description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of the condensate water in a coolingTower or boiler.

name: condenser
description: When combined with the water tag this indicates points in a condenser water system between a chiller and coolingTower.

name: connection
description: Marker tag for a logical network connection between two devices using a specific communications protocol.

name: constantVolume
description: Marks an ahu as delivering a constant volume of air flow.

name: cool
description: Cooling coil as bool or numeric point used with ahu equip.

name: cooling
description: Indicates a cooling only VAV without a fan.

name: coolingCapacity
description: Associated with the cooling mode of an HVAC system.

name: coolingTower
description: Measurement of a chiller ability to remove heat measured in "tonref" "BTU/h" or "kW".

name: coolOnly
description: Cooling towers are used to transfer process waste heat to the atmosphere.

name: cur
description: Marker tag which indicates the point has capability for subscription to its real-time current value.

name: curErr
description: Error message associated when curStatus indicates an error condition.

name: current
description: Current status of a point curVal as one of the predefined strings

name: curStatus
description: Current value of a point or other value record

name: curVal
description: Models a point associated with electrical current; should be paired with one of the following tags

name: damper
description: Marker tag on point which indicates a damper used to regulate or control the flow or pressure of air.

name: dc
description: Indicates a direct current (DC) electrical quantity or device.

name: delta
description: Indicates a differential of air water or steam between the entering and leaving sensors.

name: device
description: Models a physical device on a communication network.

name: device1Ref
description: Models the first end point device of a connection. References device id

name: device2Ref
description: Models the second end point device of a connection.  References device id

name: dew
description: Defines the dew point temperature of a weather station.

name: direction
description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air directly to a zone.

name: directZone
description: Cardinal or compass direction measured in degrees

name: dis
description: Short display name for an entity.

name: discharge
description: Associated with the discharge air an ahu or vav.

name: diverting
description: Indicates a three way valve which inputs one pipe and diverts between two output pipes.

name: domestic
description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of tap water used for drinking washing cooking and flushing of toliets.

name: dualDuct
description: Indicates an ahu which discharges into two ducts which are some combinatin of hotDeck coldDeck or neutralDeck.

name: ductArea
description: Config point on a vav for duct area measured in ft² or m².

name: dxCool
description: Indicates that a unit has cooling capability using direct expansion mechanical cooling.

name: effective
description: Used to indicate the effective setpoint which takes into account various other mode based setpoints the equip might define.

name: efficiency
description: Efficiency point of a chiller measured in "COP" or "kW/ton".

name: elec
description: Used on point or equip entities relating to electricity.

name: elecHeat
description: Indicates that a unit has heating capability using electric heat.

name: elecMeterLoad
description: Equip or point which consumes energy as electrial load. References equip id

name: elecMeterRef
description: Associates a piece of equipment with an elec meter. References equip id

name: elecPanel
description: An equip which models the physical housing for electric circuits.

name: elecPanelOf
description: Associates a circuit with its elecPanel. References equip id

name: elecReheat
description: Indicates a VAV with electric reheat.

name: enable
description: Secondary on/off point of an equip especially used with a vfd.

name: energy
description: Applied to point entities which measure energy consumption.

name: entering
description: Indicates water or steam entering a piece of equipment like a boiler or chiller.

name: enum
description: Comma separated list of text names to use for Bool or Str point.

name: equip
description: Equipment asset.

name: equipRef
description: Association with an equip entity. References equip id

name: evaporator
description: Indicates points on the evaporator mechanism used to convert a refrigerant from its liquid to gageous state.

name: exhaust
description: Associated with the exhaust air an ahu.

name: export
description: Models the power or energy exported to the electric grid.

name: faceBypass
description: A point of an ahu indicating air flow is by-passing the heating/cooling elements.

name: fan
description: Fan point or equip associated with an ahu vav or coolingTower.

name: fanPowered
description: Indicates a VAV with a fan.

name: fcu
description: Fan coil units are unitary heating/cooling assets which use the zone itself for supply air.

name: filter
description: Differential pressure across the filter of an ahu.

name: flow
description: Marker tag on a point which measures rate of volume currently flowing through a flow meter duct or pipe .

name: flue
description: Indicates points placed in the flue-gas stack of a boiler system.

name: freezeStat
description: A boolean point of an ahu indicating a freezing condition which might require a control sequence to protect the equipment.

name: freq
description: Electrical A/C frequency point measured in "Hz" for elec meter or a vfd.

name: gas
description: Used on point or equip entities relating to natural gas.

name: gasHeat
description: Indicates that a unit has heating capability using gas heat.

name: gasMeterLoad
description: Equip or point which consumes fuel gas as load. References equip id

name: geoAddr
description: Geographic street address.

name: geoCity
description: Geographic city or locality name.

name: geoCoord
description: Geographic coordinate as "C(latitude,longitude)"

name: geoCountry
description: Geographic country as ISO 3166-1 two letter code.

name: geoCounty
description: Geographic subdivision of US state.

name: geoPostalCode
description: Geographic postal code; for US this is a five digit zip code.

name: geoState
description: State or province name; for US this is two letter state code.

name: geoStreet
description: Geographic street number and name.

name: header
description: Header pipe used as central connection or manifold for other piping runs.

name: heat
description: Heating coil as bool or float point on an ahu or vav.

name: heatExchanger
description: Heat exchangers are used to transfer heat from one medium to another.

name: heating
description: Heat pumps are unitary assets which use a refrigeration cycle for both heating and cooling.

name: heatPump
description: Bool point which models the on or off state of an ahu heat wheel.

name: heatWheel
description: Associated with the heating mode of an HVAC system.

name: his
description: Indicates that a point is historized with a history log of timestamp/value pairs.

name: hisErr
description: Error message associated when hisStatus indicates an error condition.

name: hisInterpolate
description: Indicates how interpolation of a historized point should be handled.

name: hisStatus
description: Current status of a point history sync as one of the predefined strings

name: hisTotalized
description: Indicates values which are a continuous stream of totalization and should be read by computing the delta.

name: hot
description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of hot water.

name: hotDeck
description: Associated with the hot air ductwork in a dualDuct or tripleDuct AHU.

name: hotWaterHeat
description: Indicates that a unit has heating capability using hot water.

name: hotWaterPlant
description: Plant level tag for system which outputs hot water

name: hotWaterPlantRef
description: Associate an entity such as an ahu with its hotWaterPlant. References equip id

name: hotWaterReheat
description: Indicates a VAV with hot water reheat.

name: humidifier
description: Boolean or numeric point of an ahu used to indicate if if the humidifier is on or off.

name: humidity
description: Humidity measured in %RH (percent relative humidity).

name: hvac
description: Associated with HVAC (Heating Ventilating Air Conditioning)

name: id
description: Unique identifier for an entity.

name: imbalance
description: In electrical power systems models an ac volt or current phase imbalance measured in "%".

name: import
description: Models the power or energy imported from the electric grid.

name: irradiance
description: Combined with solar to measure the amount of energy arriving at the earth's surface measured in W/m².

name: isolation
description: Indicates a valve or damper used to isolate a piece of equipment from a piping system or ductwork respectively.

name: kind
description: Defines a tag value type using a predefined string constant.

name: leaving
description: Indicates water or steam exiting a piece of equipment like a boiler or chiller.

name: level
description: Indicates the fill level of a tank as a percentage where 0% is empty and 100% is filled.

name: lighting
description: Light level sensor point under lightsGroup measured in "lux" or "lumen".

name: lightLevel
description: Indicates association with the lighting system.

name: lights
description: Lighting on/off status as a boolean or if dimmable a numeric between 0% and 100%.

name: lightsGroup
description: Equip level of the lighting system which is a group of one or more lights points.

name: load
description: Models a point on a chiller used to command or measure the chiller's load as a percentage from "0%" to "100%".

name: mag
description: Models the magnitude of a volt or current point.

name: makeup
description: Paired with water to indicate control or measurement of the makeup water in a coolingTower or boiler used to replace water lost through leaks evaporation or blowdown.

name: mau
description: Used with ahu to mark an AHU as a makeup air handling unit which conditions 100% outside air and no recirculated air.

name: max
description: Associated with a maximum value.

name: maxVal
description: Applied to point to define the maximum value to read from a sensor or to write from a command/setpoint.

name: meter
description: Equip which meters usage of elec energy thermal energy gas water or steam.

name: min
description: Associated with a minimum value.

name: minVal
description: Applied to point to define the minimum value to read from a sensor or to write from a command/setpoint.

name: mixed
description: Associated with the mixed air of an ahu.

name: mixing
description: Indicates a three way valve which inputs two pipes and outputs a mixture between the two to a single output pipe.

name: multiZone
description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air to its zones via a ductwork manifold which splits the air into a duct per zone.

name: net
description: Models the net power or energy exchange with the electric grid following the load convention: import minus export.

name: network
description: Network models a communication network between multiple devices.

name: neutralDeck
description: Models the network of a connection

name: occ
description: Associated with the neutral air ductwork in a dualDuct or tripleDuct AHU.

name: occupancyIndicator
description: Marker tag used to indicate a setpoint is associated with occupied mode.

name: occupied
description: Occupancy sensor under lightsGroup.

name: oil
description: Marker tag used with a boolean point to indicate whether a site or zone is occupied (true) or unoccupied (false).

name: openLoop
description: Used on point or equip entities relating to fuel oil.

name: outside
description: Indicates coolingTower which uses the working fluid itself for evaporation into the atmosphere.

name: parallel
description: Associated with outside air often used to model ahu points.

name: perimeterHeat
description: Indicates the VAV fan pulls air from outside the primary airflow.

name: pf
description: Auxiliary heating points associated with a vav.

name: phase
description: Power factor of an elec meter as a unitless number between 0.0 and 1.0 which represents the ratio of active power to apparent power.

name: point
description: Association of one or more phases in a three-phase electrical system.

name: pointName
description: Data point such as a sensor or actuator.

name: power
description: Applied to point entities which measure energy consumed per unit time.

name: precipitation
description: Amount of atmospheric water vapor fallen which includes rain drizzle sleet snow and hail measured in mm or inches.

name: pressure
description: Static pressure associated with the measurement or control of fluids such as air oxygen water steam gas oil etc.

name: pressureDependent
description: VAV damper modulates to control space temp.

name: pressureIndependent
description: VAV damper or a control valve that modulates to maintain desired flow setpoint independent of the duct or piping pressure.

name: primaryFunction
description: Enumerated string applied to a site record to indicate the building's primary function.

name: primaryLoop
description: Indicates equipment and points which are associated with a chiller or boiler plant's primary loop - the pipework within the central plant.

name: protocol
description: String enumeration for a connection communication protocol.

name: pump
description: Marker tag for an equip or point which models a pump.

name: reactive
description: Applied to an electrical power point to indicate reactive power or imaginary power typically measured in "kVAR".

name: reciprocal
description: Indicates chiller compressor which uses pistons driven by a crankshaft.

name: refrig
description: Indicates points associated with the measurment or control of the refrigerant substance in a cooling system like a chiller.

name: reheat
description: Reheat point of a vav.

name: reheating
description: Associated with the reheating mode of a VAV.

name: return
description: Associated with the return air an ahu.

name: rooftop
description: Used with ahu to mark an AHU as a packaged rooftop unit (RTU).

name: run
description: Primary on/off point of an equip especially used with a vfd.

name: screw
description: Indicates chiller compressor which uses a rotary mechanism.

name: secondaryLoop
description: Indicates equipment and points which are associated with a chiller or boiler plant's secondary loop - the pipework from the central plant to the building.

name: sensor
description: Classifies a point as an input AI/BI or sensor.

name: series
description: Indicates the VAV pulls air from the primary airflow.

name: singleDuct
description: Indicates an ahu which uses a single duct for all air flow.

name: site
description: Building or other type of facility with unique street address.

name: siteMeter
description: Applied to a meter which exclusively meters a single site identified by siteRef.

name: sitePanel
description: Marker tag for a elecPanel to indicate its the main site-level panel.

name: siteRef
description: Association with a site entity. References site id

name: solar
description: Point associated with the measurement of the sunlight.

name: sp
description: Classifies a point as a setpoint soft point or process control variable.

name: speed
description: When used as a vfd point it is speed measured in "%" where 0% is off and 100% is the fastest speed.

name: stage
description: Indicates the stage of an AHU cooling or heating element.

name: standby
description: Marker tag used to indicate a setpoint is associated with standby mode.

name: steam
description: Point associated with the measurement or control of steam.

name: steamHeat
description: Indicates that a unit has heating capability using steam.

name: steamMeterLoad
description: Equip or point which consumes steam as load. References equip id

name: steamPlant
description: Plant level tag for system which outputs steam

name: steamPlantRef
description: Associate an entity such as an ahu with its steamPlant. References equip id

name: submeterOf
description: Ref tag to indicate that an elecPanel is positioned underneath another panel in the electric distribution system. References equip id

name: subPanelOf
description: This tag is applied to submeters and references the parent meter. References equip id

name: sunrise
description: Boolean point associated with a weather station for historizing sunrise and sunset times.

name: tank
description: Marker tag for an equip which models a storage tank vessel.

name: temp
description: Temperature measured in °C or °F.

name: thd
description: In electrical power systems models the total harmonic distortion of a volt or current point measured in "%".

name: total
description: Indicates a total quantity.

name: tripleDuct
description: Indicates an ahu which discharges into three ducts which are the hotDeck coldDeck and neutralDeck.

name: tz
description: Timezone identifier string which is a city name from the zoneinfo database.

name: unit
description: Unit of measurement identifier from unit database.

name: unocc
description: Marker tag used to indicate a setpoint is associated with unoccupied mode.

name: uv
description: Unit ventilators are unitary heating/cooling assets which have direct access to outside fresh air.

name: valve
description: Marker tag on point which indicates a valve used to regulate or control the flow or pressure of a fluid.

name: variableVolume
description: Marks an ahu as delivering a variable volume of air flow.

name: vav
description: Variable Volume Volume supply duct equip.

name: vavMode
description: Enumerated Str point which specifies a VAV's operating mode as one the following standardized string values

name: vavZone
description: Marker for an ahu which delivers air to zones via vav terminal units.

name: vfd
description: Marker for a motor equip with variable frequency drive.

name: visibility
description: Distance at which light can be clearly discerned measured in km or miles.

name: volt
description: Models a point associated with electrical voltage; should be paired with one of the following tags

name: volume
description: Marker tag on a point which measures total volume which has flowed through a meter duct or pipe.

name: water
description: Point associated with the measurement or control of water.

name: waterCooled
description: Indicates chiller which uses water to cool the hot refrigerant.

name: waterMeterLoad
description: Equip or point which consumes water as load. References equip id

name: weather
description: Marker tag for a weather station entity.

name: weatherCond
description: Used with a Str enum point to enumerate conditions with one of the following string values

name: weatherPoint
description: Point sensor value associated with a weather station.

name: weatherRef
description: Associates an entity with a weather station. References weather id

name: wetBulb
description: Associates a point with the wet-bulb temperature.

name: wind
description: Point associated with the measurement of the wind.

name: writable
description: Annotates a point as a writable output with 16-level priority array.

name: writeErr
description: Error message associated when writeStatus indicates an error condition.

name: writeLevel
description: Current priority level for writeVal as number between 1 and 17.

name: writeStatus
description: Current status of a writable point output

name: writeVal
description: Current desired value to write to output.

name: yearBuilt
description: Tag on site which is four digit year that a building was first built.

name: zone
description: Associated with a conditioned zone of a building.

name: volttronPointName
description: Logical name for the point. Point name used by VOLTTRON

name: campus
description: Marks a campus that might have one or more site/building

name: campusRef
description: References campus id
